name: Alone (itch) (Qrikos Team)
description:
Qriko’s team is proud to present our latest project in development: Alone…

-Synopsis: Bill the guard, suspects he's not alone in the mall and is terrified of the noises and shadows he sees, after repeated occasions he's driven into a state of paranoia that forces him to escape from the mall.

We hope our game fulfill your expectations, and also we would appreciate any feedback.

-Special thanks to Leo Irak for helping us with fixing some of the code-
